title: Ssrf in SecureApp Inc
description: Discovered Server-Side Request Forgery via URL params affecting SecureApp Inc. The application does not properly sanitize user input, allowing an attacker to inject malicious payloads that are executed by the application.
impact: An attacker can exploit this vulnerability to make requests to internal systems and potentially access sensitive data.
reproduction_steps: Observe that the payload is executed
proof_of_concept:
# Proof of Concept

Payload: http://localhost

This demonstrates Server-Side Request Forgery via URL params

# Validation at 2025-11-11T01:55:37.738677
Validation successful with alternative payload at 2025-11-11T01:55:37.738675
remediation: Validate and sanitize all URLs. Implement allowlist of permitted domains. Use network segmentation to limit internal access.
